explains: n. 挚爱，忠诚；奉献；（宗教的）虔诚；祈祷，礼拜
wordGroup: devotion to duty 忠于职守(常用于正式嘉奖大会上)
devotion aura 虔诚光环；专注光环；热血灵光

sentences.en: Her devotion to the job left her with very little free time.
sentences.cn: 她全身心投入工作，几乎没有闲暇。

sentences.en: He recalled her devotion to her husband during his hour of need.
sentences.cn: 他回想起她在丈夫需要帮助时所做出的无私奉献。
